General.Name: Rane (Madras) Limited
General.Description: Rane (Madras) Limited manufactures and sells auto components for transportation industry in India. It offers steering and suspension linkage products, steering gears, and high precision aluminum die castings. The company markets and sells its products to the manufacturers of passenger cars, utility vehicles, and farm tractors. It also exports its products. Rane (Madras) Limited was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Chennai, India. Rane (Madras) Limited is a subsidiary of Rane Holdings Limited.
